content: i love knitting up some socks and when people ask me what i m making i just reply with just some socks which i think just makes the perfect name for this pattern i ve knit many many socks and have slowly been writing out my little notes for how i make them best so that they fit my feet perfectly each time i included some of the tips and tricks and the whys in this pattern as well in hopes that it is able to clear a bit of the confusion around sock knitting up a bit for everyone this pattern is also free please use it to learn how to make your first pair of socks and start going sock crazy they re a very portable project that can accompany you anywhere you go and great for summer knitting as fingering weight yarn is nice and light sizes small 7 5in medium 8 5in large 9 5in what you need to get started us 1 needles either double pointed needles circulars with 32in cable or 9in circulars and your favorite fingering weight sock yarn
